body.name: Niki's Natural Baby Wipes | Organic Baby Wipes Sensitive | Made with Manuka Honey and Coconut Oil, Unscented | EWG Verified | 248 Wipes (4 Pack x 62 Count Wipes)

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Nikis Natural Wipes Store

features: HYPOALLERGENIC; Nikis moisturizes sensitive skin, safe for dermatitis and eczema and approved by US National Eczema Association
SUITABLE TO USE FROM BIRTH, including preemie, newborn, infants; formulated for bum, face and hands
PURE WET WIPE CONTAINS NO HARSH PRESERVATIVES due to the natural strengths of Manuka Honey and Coconut Oil
ETHICALLY SOURCED SENSITIVE BABY WIPES specifically designed to maintain the delicate pH of your baby's skin. Current expiration is November, 2024.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,881 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #59 in Diaper Wipes & Refills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t look further. This is THE BEST.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has extremely sensitive skin so we’v been using cloth diapers for over a year but cloth wipes didn’t work very well for us so I’ve been searching for natural wet wipes for so long. I literally tried all the natural brands out there and none of them were good enough. I don’t like the ingredients, materials (too thin or hard to pull, etc.), and most importantly it would give her rash every time.When I was going to give up and go back to cloth wipes, I finally found Nikki’s. I didn’t like the strong smell at first but it’s actually quite nice now that i’m used to it. The material is soft, tough, perfect length, and it’s easy to take individual wipe out of the bag. It’s so gentle on baby’s sensitive area it never gave her a rash!!!! It’s that perfect wipes I’ve been looking for. I love how each ingredient is explained so people can understand more easily. Highly recommend, it’s simply the best on the market!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleared rash & no burn/filmy feel!
reviews.reviewText: These are SO soft! It feels moisturizing and soothing like a light lotion wipe. Doesn’t leave a film feel or any artificial leftovers. I can wipe the same area several times and not irritate my sons skin. He’s actually been letting me wipe his face more when he realizes it’s not the other wipes. I’ve tried every sensitive skin, baby wipe under the planet for myself and they all give me a scraped/burn-like filmy feel for 10-30 min after. Makes me think babies hate their face and diaper changes after a certain point because of that irritation I feel too..? Also, my sons had the same rashes pop up for several months and never fully go away. I use every high-end oil, diaper rash cream, let my son air out with nothing on and it would go down but never fully gone. All I’ve done is change to these wipes and his rashes cleared up completely and almost immediately! I’ve seen some reviews about the smell. The smell is light and okay. Smells similar to a jar of coconut oil.. kind of like my jars I bring for tanning that sit in the sun for a while. Not coconuty though. I don’t smell unless put up to my face. Either way, they work so well! And they distribute wipes perfectly, no tangles and pulling out 5 wipes with 1.Update: I’ve been using these a year now and I only seemed to have one batch that had that “coconut jar smell”. None have smelled since, not that it bothered me but everyone is different. They’re still my go-to choice especially since coconut oil and honey are both very powerful cleansing and healing substances. So I love that these have actual benefits that do work after use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these wipes!
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes! I wish they weren’t so expensive but it’s worth the price. They are gentle on my sons skin and have a nice light scent. They come out of the package nicely too. I don’t know why so many other wipes are hard to get out or come out in clumps. They definitely mastered the packaging!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value, decent wipes
reviews.reviewText: Nothing particularly special or exciting but the price and quality are fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best scent and they never give my baby any sort of rash. Just wish they were a little cheaper, but worth the splurge for my baby. If you’re looking for the best nontoxic wipe option, this is it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you need wipes, use these
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are strong and durable. They have a light scent. Most importantly, they are anti bacterial, gentle, etc. in fact, they are a good substitute to keep in the car to wipe your hands instead of harsh chemical hand sanitizer. Get rid of your make up wipes too. Always use these types of items in moderation-save the planet and dispose of them appropriately - but if you use sanitizer and have skin issues-consider this product. FYI-I do not have kids but these wipes are versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little drier than I’m used to but still good.
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are a tad drier than some of their counterparts I’ve tried but over all I really like them. No reactions all on baby’s sensitive bum.
We love these wipes! Have been exclusively using and have zero nappy rash. Best on the market and love the natural ingredients

reviews.reviewTitle: This product positively and immediately changed my daughters life - amazing product, a must have!
reviews.reviewText: Niki's Natural Baby Wipes are the best baby wipe product my wife and I have ever seen on the market and we cannot recommend this product highly enough. Our 14mth old daughter (second born) struggled constantly with terrible nappy rash and frequent UTI's/bladder infections and were concerned about what was causing the issues - we wondered if it was the wipes that we were using (a "natural" wipe). We found Nikis Natural wipes on line through Amazon and having read the information we decided to order the wipes. We saw an immediate difference, she has had nappy rash once and no UTI/Bladder infections! However when she started daycare, they commenced using the traditional wipes and not long thereafter the rash and infections started again. We have provided the daycare with Nikis Natural wipes and again the issues have gone! As Nikis Natural Wipes are completely toxin free, and have manuka honey as an active ingredient they have changed our daughters life for the better. And they smell and feel great, my wife has started using them for makeup remover as well. Again I cannot recommend this product highly enough - it is a must have for any young family.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best wipes and reassuring to know it’s biodegradable
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes. Our whole family uses them. I especially love it’s soft coconut and honey scent and knowing that my baby has never had a nappy rash break out, it’s well worth it! Highly recommend.
will not buy any other wipes love them. They are the best

There's no comparing to Niki's! It has the right amount of wetness and it leaves our little one's bum feeling soft and nappy rash free. I love that it contains both natural and organic ingredients and it comes out one at a time - how can you top that.. best baby wipes ever!
